Package utilities

Enum functions

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<functions>
utilities.functions
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<functions>, java.lang.constant.Constable, java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Float,​java.lang.Float>
public enum functions
extends java.lang.Enum<functions>
implements java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Float,​java.lang.Float>
enum for standard activation function
contain activations functions with their expression and derivative (derivative's variable are the function itself and not the function input)
Version:
1.3
Author:
Physic Dev
